attributes.action: Call a referendum for assisted dying bill.
attributes.additional_details: Our Government should give a chance to all residents in UK and ask them if they are happy with this bill because the bill will have an effect on to everyone, let’s us have a say.
attributes.background: I want our Government to be giving the public a chance to say assisted dying bill.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

We are petitioning for a National Referendum on Assisted Dying
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701838
